notes.text:
This update for iproute2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20795: Fixed a use-after-free vulnerability in get_netnsid_from_name. (bsc#1171452)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: iproute2 before 5.1.0 has a use-after-free in get_netnsid_from_name in ip/ipnetns.c. NOTE: security relevance may be limited to certain uses of setuid that, although not a default, are sometimes a configuration option offered to end users. Even when setuid is used, other factors (such as C library configuration) may block exploitability.
notes.title: CVE description
